EmailTemplate.subject: Check Out Our Cost Savings on Maintenance
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear Customer,
Did you know that if your fleet has Honeywell avionics on board you could fix your annual avionics maintenance costs by signing up for the Honeywell's Avionics Protection Plan (HAPP)? What’s more, with flexible payment terms, your budgeting process will be easier! Unplanned or unbudgeted minor repairs can cost in excess of $50,000 and major repairs and exchanges considerably more. With an annual HAPP contract costing on average $40,000*, you can avoid unplanned maintenance costs, downtime and unnecessary stress. After all, when it comes to your aircraft, time is money!
*HAPP annual cost does vary per airframe and flight hours, above is based on AW139.
LEARN MORE <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/helohapp]]>
If you don't have Honeywell avionics, please click <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/NonHONAVNX_ComHelo_HAPP.html]]> here.
